targets.rawSql: SELECT COUNT(*) as "Total" FROM entities WHERE etype = 'FQDN' and content->>'name' IN (${subs})

SELECT fqdn AS "FQDN", ip_addr AS "IP Address" 
FROM names_to_addrs('${subs:csv}', '${__from:date:iso}', '${__to:date:iso}')

SELECT ips.content->>'address' AS "IP Address", nets.content->>'cidr' AS "Netblock", 
asns.content->>'number' AS "ASN", orgs.content->>'name' AS "Organization" 
FROM ((((((((((entities AS ips  
INNER JOIN edges AS rels1 ON ips.id = rels1.to_entity_id) 
INNER JOIN entities AS nets ON rels1.from_entity_id = nets.id) 
INNER JOIN edges AS rels2 ON nets.id = rels2.from_entity_id) 
INNER JOIN entities AS rdap ON rels2.to_entity_id = rdap.id) 
INNER JOIN edges AS rels3 ON rdap.id = rels3.from_entity_id) 
INNER JOIN entities AS contact ON rels3.to_entity_id = contact.id) 
INNER JOIN edges AS rels4 ON contact.id = rels4.from_entity_id) 
INNER JOIN entities AS orgs ON rels4.to_entity_id = orgs.id) 
INNER JOIN edges AS rels5 ON nets.id = rels5.to_entity_id) 
INNER JOIN entities AS asns ON rels5.from_entity_id = asns.id) 
WHERE ips.etype = 'IPAddress' AND nets.etype = 'Netblock' AND rdap.etype = 'IPNetRecord' 
AND contact.etype = 'ContactRecord' AND orgs.etype = 'Organization' AND asns.etype = 'AutonomousSystem' 
AND rels1.etype = 'contains' AND rels2.etype = 'registration' AND rels3.etype = 'registrant' 
AND rels4.etype = 'organization' AND rels5.etype = 'announces'
AND rels1.last_seen >= '${__from:date:iso}' AND rels1.last_seen <= '${__to:date:iso}' 
AND rels2.last_seen >= '${__from:date:iso}' AND rels2.last_seen <= '${__to:date:iso}' 
AND rels3.last_seen >= '${__from:date:iso}' AND rels3.last_seen <= '${__to:date:iso}' 
AND rels4.last_seen >= '${__from:date:iso}' AND rels4.last_seen <= '${__to:date:iso}' 
AND rels5.last_seen >= '${__from:date:iso}' AND rels5.last_seen <= '${__to:date:iso}' 
AND orgs.content->>'name' IN (${organizations}) AND ips.content->>'address' IN (${geolist}) 
UNION 
SELECT '0' AS "IP Address", '-' AS "Netblock", '0' AS "ASN", '-' AS "Organization"
SELECT extract(day from date_trunc('day', age(last_seen))) AS interval FROM entities WHERE etype = 'FQDN' AND content->>'name' IN (${subs})
SELECT ip_addr AS "IP Address", city AS "City", latitude AS "Latitude", longitude AS "Longitude" FROM batch_ip_geo('${geoips:csv}')

SELECT ips.content->>'address' AS "IP Address", string_agg(orgs.content->>'name', ' - ' ORDER BY orgs.content->>'name') AS "Organization" 
FROM ((((((((entities AS ips  
INNER JOIN edges AS rels1 ON ips.id = rels1.to_entity_id) 
INNER JOIN entities AS nets ON rels1.from_entity_id = nets.id) 
INNER JOIN edges AS rels2 ON nets.id = rels2.from_entity_id) 
INNER JOIN entities AS rdap ON rels2.to_entity_id = rdap.id) 
INNER JOIN edges AS rels3 ON rdap.id = rels3.from_entity_id) 
INNER JOIN entities AS contact ON rels3.to_entity_id = contact.id) 
INNER JOIN edges AS rels4 ON rels4.from_entity_id = contact.id) 
INNER JOIN entities AS orgs ON rels4.to_entity_id = orgs.id) 
WHERE ips.etype = 'IPAddress' AND nets.etype = 'Netblock' 
AND rdap.etype = 'IPNetRecord' AND contact.etype = 'ContactRecord' AND orgs.etype = 'Organization' 
AND rels1.etype = 'contains' AND rels2.etype = 'registration' 
AND rels3.etype = 'registrant' AND rels4.etype = 'organization' 
AND ips.content->>'address' IN (${addresses}) 
AND rels1.last_seen >= '${__from:date:iso}' AND rels1.last_seen <= '${__to:date:iso}' 
AND rels2.last_seen >= '${__from:date:iso}' AND rels2.last_seen <= '${__to:date:iso}' 
AND rels3.last_seen >= '${__from:date:iso}' AND rels3.last_seen <= '${__to:date:iso}' 
AND rels4.last_seen >= '${__from:date:iso}' AND rels4.last_seen <= '${__to:date:iso}' 
GROUP BY ips.content->>'address'

options.content: The OWASP Amass Project uses the [IP2Location LITE](https://lite.ip2location.com) database for IP geolocation.

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT substring(zone.name from '(([a-zA-Z0-9]{1}|[_a-zA-Z0-9]{1}[_a-zA-Z0-9-]{0,61}[a-zA-Z0-9]{1})[.]{1}[a-zA-Z]{2,61}$)') AS name FROM ((SELECT id, content->>'name' as name FROM entities WHERE etype = 'FQDN' 
AND id IN (SELECT from_entity_id FROM edges WHERE etype = 'node')) as zone 
INNER JOIN edges ON zone.id = edges.from_entity_id) 
WHERE edges.etype = 'mx_record'
list.label: Namespaces
list.name: domains
list.query:
SELECT DISTINCT substring(zone.name from '(([a-zA-Z0-9]{1}|[_a-zA-Z0-9]{1}[_a-zA-Z0-9-]{0,61}[a-zA-Z0-9]{1})[.]{1}[a-zA-Z]{2,61}$)') AS name FROM ((SELECT id, content->>'name' as name FROM entities WHERE etype = 'FQDN' 
AND id IN (SELECT from_entity_id FROM edges WHERE etype = 'node')) as zone 
INNER JOIN edges ON zone.id = edges.from_entity_id) 
WHERE edges.etype = 'mx_record'

list.definition:
SELECT fqdns.content->>'name' AS "FQDN" FROM ((entities AS fqdns 
INNER JOIN edges ON fqdns.id = edges.from_entity_id) 
INNER JOIN entities AS target ON edges.to_entity_id = target.id) 
WHERE fqdns.etype = 'FQDN' AND target.etype IN ('FQDN', 'IPAddress')
AND edges.etype IN ('a_record', 'aaaa_record', 'cname_record')
AND fqdns.content->>'name' SIMILAR TO '%${domains:regex}'
AND edges.last_seen > '${__from:date:iso}' AND edges.last_seen < '${__to:date:iso}' 
UNION 
SELECT '-' AS "FQDN"
list.description: Subdomain names from the already selected domains variable
list.name: subs
list.query:
SELECT fqdns.content->>'name' AS "FQDN" FROM ((entities AS fqdns 
INNER JOIN edges ON fqdns.id = edges.from_entity_id) 
INNER JOIN entities AS target ON edges.to_entity_id = target.id) 
WHERE fqdns.etype = 'FQDN' AND target.etype IN ('FQDN', 'IPAddress')
AND edges.etype IN ('a_record', 'aaaa_record', 'cname_record')
AND fqdns.content->>'name' SIMILAR TO '%${domains:regex}'
AND edges.last_seen > '${__from:date:iso}' AND edges.last_seen < '${__to:date:iso}' 
UNION 
SELECT '-' AS "FQDN"

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT ip_addr FROM names_to_addrs('${subs:csv}', '${__from:date:iso}', '${__to:date:iso}') 
UNION 
SELECT '0.0.0.0' AS ip_addr
list.description: IP addresses for the subdomains in scope
list.name: addresses
list.query:
SELECT DISTINCT ip_addr FROM names_to_addrs('${subs:csv}', '${__from:date:iso}', '${__to:date:iso}') 
UNION 
SELECT '0.0.0.0' AS ip_addr

list.definition:
SELECT string_agg(orgs.content->>'name', ' - ' ORDER BY orgs.content->>'name') AS "Organization" 
FROM ((((((((entities AS ips  
INNER JOIN edges AS rels1 ON ips.id = rels1.to_entity_id) 
INNER JOIN entities AS nets ON rels1.from_entity_id = nets.id) 
INNER JOIN edges AS rels2 ON nets.id = rels2.from_entity_id) 
INNER JOIN entities AS rdap ON rels2.to_entity_id = rdap.id) 
INNER JOIN edges AS rels3 ON rdap.id = rels3.from_entity_id) 
INNER JOIN entities AS contact ON rels3.to_entity_id = contact.id) 
INNER JOIN edges AS rels4 ON contact.id = rels4.from_entity_id) 
INNER JOIN entities AS orgs ON rels4.to_entity_id = orgs.id) 
WHERE rels1.etype = 'contains' AND ips.etype = 'IPAddress' 
AND nets.etype = 'Netblock' AND rels2.etype = 'registration' AND rels3.etype = 'registrant' AND rels4.etype = 'organization' 
AND rdap.etype = 'IPNetRecord' AND contact.etype = 'ContactRecord' AND orgs.etype = 'Organization'
AND rels1.last_seen >= '${__from:date:iso}' AND rels1.last_seen <= '${__to:date:iso}' 
AND rels2.last_seen >= '${__from:date:iso}' AND rels2.last_seen <= '${__to:date:iso}' 
AND rels3.last_seen >= '${__from:date:iso}' AND rels3.last_seen <= '${__to:date:iso}' 
AND rels4.last_seen >= '${__from:date:iso}' AND rels4.last_seen <= '${__to:date:iso}' 
AND ips.content->>'address' IN (${addresses}) 
GROUP BY ips.content->>'address' 
UNION 
SELECT '-' AS "Organization"
list.name: organizations
list.query:
SELECT string_agg(orgs.content->>'name', ' - ' ORDER BY orgs.content->>'name') AS "Organization" 
FROM ((((((((entities AS ips  
INNER JOIN edges AS rels1 ON ips.id = rels1.to_entity_id) 
INNER JOIN entities AS nets ON rels1.from_entity_id = nets.id) 
INNER JOIN edges AS rels2 ON nets.id = rels2.from_entity_id) 
INNER JOIN entities AS rdap ON rels2.to_entity_id = rdap.id) 
INNER JOIN edges AS rels3 ON rdap.id = rels3.from_entity_id) 
INNER JOIN entities AS contact ON rels3.to_entity_id = contact.id) 
INNER JOIN edges AS rels4 ON contact.id = rels4.from_entity_id) 
INNER JOIN entities AS orgs ON rels4.to_entity_id = orgs.id) 
WHERE rels1.etype = 'contains' AND ips.etype = 'IPAddress' 
AND nets.etype = 'Netblock' AND rels2.etype = 'registration' AND rels3.etype = 'registrant' AND rels4.etype = 'organization' 
AND rdap.etype = 'IPNetRecord' AND contact.etype = 'ContactRecord' AND orgs.etype = 'Organization'
AND rels1.last_seen >= '${__from:date:iso}' AND rels1.last_seen <= '${__to:date:iso}' 
AND rels2.last_seen >= '${__from:date:iso}' AND rels2.last_seen <= '${__to:date:iso}' 
AND rels3.last_seen >= '${__from:date:iso}' AND rels3.last_seen <= '${__to:date:iso}' 
AND rels4.last_seen >= '${__from:date:iso}' AND rels4.last_seen <= '${__to:date:iso}' 
AND ips.content->>'address' IN (${addresses}) 
GROUP BY ips.content->>'address' 
UNION 
SELECT '-' AS "Organization"

list.definition:
SELECT ips.content->>'address' AS "IP Address" 
FROM ((((((((entities AS ips  
INNER JOIN edges AS rels1 ON ips.id = rels1.to_entity_id) 
INNER JOIN entities AS nets ON rels1.from_entity_id = nets.id) 
INNER JOIN edges AS rels2 ON nets.id = rels2.from_entity_id) 
INNER JOIN entities AS rdap ON rels2.to_entity_id = rdap.id) 
INNER JOIN edges AS rels3 ON rdap.id = rels3.from_entity_id) 
INNER JOIN entities AS contact ON rels3.to_entity_id = contact.id) 
INNER JOIN edges AS rels4 ON contact.id = rels4.from_entity_id) 
INNER JOIN entities AS orgs ON rels4.to_entity_id = orgs.id) 
WHERE ips.etype = 'IPAddress' AND nets.etype = 'Netblock' AND rdap.etype = 'IPNetRecord' 
AND contact.etype = 'ContactRecord' AND orgs.etype = 'Organization'
AND rels1.etype = 'contains' AND rels2.etype = 'registration' AND rels3.etype = 'registrant' 
AND rels4.etype = 'organization'
AND rels1.last_seen >= '${__from:date:iso}' AND rels1.last_seen <= '${__to:date:iso}' 
AND rels2.last_seen >= '${__from:date:iso}' AND rels2.last_seen <= '${__to:date:iso}' 
AND rels3.last_seen >= '${__from:date:iso}' AND rels3.last_seen <= '${__to:date:iso}'  
AND rels4.last_seen >= '${__from:date:iso}' AND rels4.last_seen <= '${__to:date:iso}' 
AND ips.content->>'address' IN (${addresses}) 
AND orgs.content->>'name' IN (${organizations}) 
UNION 
SELECT '0.0.0.0' AS "IP Address"
list.name: geoips
list.query:
SELECT ips.content->>'address' AS "IP Address" 
FROM ((((((((entities AS ips  
INNER JOIN edges AS rels1 ON ips.id = rels1.to_entity_id) 
INNER JOIN entities AS nets ON rels1.from_entity_id = nets.id) 
INNER JOIN edges AS rels2 ON nets.id = rels2.from_entity_id) 
INNER JOIN entities AS rdap ON rels2.to_entity_id = rdap.id) 
INNER JOIN edges AS rels3 ON rdap.id = rels3.from_entity_id) 
INNER JOIN entities AS contact ON rels3.to_entity_id = contact.id) 
INNER JOIN edges AS rels4 ON contact.id = rels4.from_entity_id) 
INNER JOIN entities AS orgs ON rels4.to_entity_id = orgs.id) 
WHERE ips.etype = 'IPAddress' AND nets.etype = 'Netblock' AND rdap.etype = 'IPNetRecord' 
AND contact.etype = 'ContactRecord' AND orgs.etype = 'Organization'
AND rels1.etype = 'contains' AND rels2.etype = 'registration' AND rels3.etype = 'registrant' 
AND rels4.etype = 'organization'
AND rels1.last_seen >= '${__from:date:iso}' AND rels1.last_seen <= '${__to:date:iso}' 
AND rels2.last_seen >= '${__from:date:iso}' AND rels2.last_seen <= '${__to:date:iso}' 
AND rels3.last_seen >= '${__from:date:iso}' AND rels3.last_seen <= '${__to:date:iso}'  
AND rels4.last_seen >= '${__from:date:iso}' AND rels4.last_seen <= '${__to:date:iso}' 
AND ips.content->>'address' IN (${addresses}) 
AND orgs.content->>'name' IN (${organizations}) 
UNION 
SELECT '0.0.0.0' AS "IP Address"

list.definition:
SELECT * FROM unnest(string_to_array('${addresses:csv}', ',')) WHERE '${geocity:raw}' = '' 
UNION 
SELECT ip_addr FROM batch_ip_geo('${addresses:csv}') 
WHERE city = '${geocity:raw}'
list.name: geolist
list.query:
SELECT * FROM unnest(string_to_array('${addresses:csv}', ',')) WHERE '${geocity:raw}' = '' 
UNION 
SELECT ip_addr FROM batch_ip_geo('${addresses:csv}') 
WHERE city = '${geocity:raw}'
